TITLE: Maven Dependencies Configuration for Gaffer Core
DESCRIPTION: Maven XML configuration showing the minimum required dependencies to use Gaffer in a Java project with Accumulo store. Includes the core graph module and accumulo-store dependencies.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gchq/gaffer/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: XML
CODE:
```
<dependency>
    <groupId>uk.gov.gchq.gaffer</groupId>
    <artifactId>graph</artifactId>
    <version>${gaffer.version}</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>
    <groupId>uk.gov.gchq.gaffer</groupId>
    <artifactId>accumulo-store</artifactId>
    <version>${gaffer.version}</version>
</dependency>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Elements to Federated Graphs with JSON
DESCRIPTION: JSON operation to add sample data to both federated graphs. This adds a BasicEntity to the mapEntities graph and a BasicEdge to the mapEdges graph, both with count properties set to 1.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gchq/gaffer/blob/develop/example/federated-demo/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
    "class" : "uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.operation.impl.add.AddElements",
    "input" : [ {
     "group" : "BasicEntity",
     "vertex" : "1",
     "properties" : {
       "count" : 1
     },
     "class" : "uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.data.element.Entity"
    }, {
     "group" : "BasicEdge",
     "source" : "1",
     "destination" : "2",
     "directed" : true,
     "properties" : {
       "count" : 1
     },
     "class" : "uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.data.element.Edge"
    } ],
     "options": {
      "gaffer.federatedstore.operation.graphIds": "mapEntities,mapEdges"
      }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Executing Advanced Federated Operation Chain in JSON
DESCRIPTION: Example of a complex operation chain that fetches all elements from federated graphs and applies limits at different stages. This demonstrates nested operations and result truncation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gchq/gaffer/blob/develop/example/federated-demo/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
   "class": "uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.operation.OperationChain",
   "operations": [
      {
         "class": "uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.federatedstore.operation.FederatedOperation",
         "operation": {
            "operations": [
               {
                  "class": "uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.operation.impl.get.GetAllElements"
               },
               {
                  "class": "uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.operation.impl.Limit",
                  "resultLimit": 1,
                  "truncate": true
               }
            ]
         }
      },
      {
         "class": "uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.operation.impl.Limit",
         "resultLimit": 1,
         "truncate": true
      }
   ]
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Retrieving Merged Schemas from Federated Store in JSON
DESCRIPTION: JSON operation to fetch the combined schemas from all graphs in the Federated Store. The compact parameter controls whether the schema is returned in a simplified format.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gchq/gaffer/blob/develop/example/federated-demo/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
   "class": "uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.store.operation.GetSchema",
   "compact": false
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Retrieving Single Graph Schema from Federated Store in JSON
DESCRIPTION: JSON operation to fetch the schema for a specific graph (mapEdges) from the Federated Store using the graphIds option. This demonstrates targeting operations to specific federated graphs.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gchq/gaffer/blob/develop/example/federated-demo/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
    "class": "uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.store.operation.GetSchema",
    "compact": false,
    "options": {
        "gaffer.federatedstore.operation.graphIds": "mapEdges"
    }
}
```

TITLE: Cloning and Running Gaffer FederatedStore Example
DESCRIPTION: This bash script clones the Gaffer repository, navigates to the real-federated-store example directory, and runs a setup script to deploy the REST API locally.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gchq/gaffer/blob/develop/example/real-federated-store/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# Clone the Gaffer repository, to reduce the amount you need to download this will only clone the master branch with a depth of 1 so there won't be any history.
git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/gchq/Gaffer.git #--branch master
cd Gaffer/example/real-federated-store/

# Run this script from this directory.
# This will download several maven dependencies such as tomcat.
./startRealFederatedStore.sh
```

TITLE: Adding MapEdges Graph to Federated Store with JSON
DESCRIPTION: JSON operation to add a Map graph with edge definitions to the Federated Store. This creates a graph with ID 'mapEdges' that supports basic edges with count properties.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gchq/gaffer/blob/develop/example/federated-demo/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
    "class": "uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.federatedstore.operation.AddGraph",
    "graphId": "mapEdges",
    "storeProperties": {
      "gaffer.store.class":"uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.mapstore.MapStore"
    },
    "schema": {
         "edges": {
             "BasicEdge": {
               "source": "vertex",
               "destination": "vertex",
               "directed": "true",
               "properties": {
                 "count": "count"
               }
             }
           },

       "types": {
         "vertex": {
           "class": "java.lang.String"
         },
         "count": {
           "class": "java.lang.Integer",
           "aggregateFunction": {
             "class": "uk.gov.gchq.koryphe.impl.binaryoperator.Sum"
           }
         },
         "true": {
           "description": "A simple boolean that must always be true.",
           "class": "java.lang.Boolean",
           "validateFunctions": [
             {
               "class": "uk.gov.gchq.koryphe.impl.predicate.IsTrue"
             }
           ]
         }
       }
     },
    "isPublic": true
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding MapEntities Graph to Federated Store with JSON
DESCRIPTION: JSON operation to add a second Map graph with entity definitions to the Federated Store. This creates a graph with ID 'mapEntities' that supports basic entities with count properties.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gchq/gaffer/blob/develop/example/federated-demo/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
    "class": "uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.federatedstore.operation.AddGraph",
    "graphId": "mapEntities",
    "storeProperties": {
       "gaffer.store.class":"uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.mapstore.MapStore"
    },
    "schema": {
       "entities": {
         "BasicEntity": {
           "vertex": "vertex",
           "properties": {
             "count": "count"
           }
         }
       },
       "types": {
         "vertex": {
           "class": "java.lang.String"
         },
         "count": {
           "class": "java.lang.Integer",
           "aggregateFunction": {
             "class": "uk.gov.gchq.koryphe.impl.binaryoperator.Sum"
           }
         }
       }
    },
    "isPublic": true
}
```

TITLE: Executing curl commands for Gaffer FederatedStore operations
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to navigate to the curl operation examples directory and execute a shell script to get all graph IDs. The command demonstrates the basic pattern for executing predefined Gaffer operations against the REST API.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gchq/gaffer/blob/develop/example/real-federated-store/have-a-go-at-operations/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cd curl-operation-examples/
./curl_getAllGraphIds.sh
```

TITLE: Cloning and Starting Gaffer Federated Demo in Bash
DESCRIPTION: Commands to clone the Gaffer repository and start the federated demo. This will download dependencies such as Tomcat and deploy the REST API to localhost:8080/rest.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gchq/gaffer/blob/develop/example/federated-demo/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# Clone the Gaffer repository, to reduce the amount you need to download this will only clone the master branch with a depth of 1 so there won't be any history.
git clone --depth 1 --branch master https://github.com/gchq/Gaffer.git
cd Gaffer

# Run the start script. This will download several maven dependencies such as tomcat.
# If you have a snapshot version and want to build all dependencies first then add -am as a script argument
./example/federated-demo/scripts/start.sh
```

TITLE: Running the createGraphs bash script for Gaffer road use demo
DESCRIPTION: A bash command to execute the createGraphs.sh script which uses curl and JSON files to automatically generate and populate three graphs with road use data. The script must be run from within the road-use directory.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gchq/gaffer/blob/develop/example/federated-demo/road-use/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
./scripts/createGraphs.sh
```

# Run the start script. This will download several maven dependencies such as tomcat.

DESCRIPTION: Commands to clone the Gaffer repository and start the road traffic demo. Requires Java 8, Maven, and Git. Deploys REST API to localhost:8080/rest.
